title: Patrick Collison, Co-Founder Of Stripe
description: Host Jessica Harris talks with Patrick Collison, co-founder of Stripe, an online payment platform. Harris also talks with Philip Krim, the co-founder of Casper.
itunes:title: Patrick Collison, Co-Founder Of Stripe
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Host Jessica Harris talks with Patrick Collison, co-founder of Stripe, an online payment platform. Harris also talks with Philip Krim, the co-founder of Casper.
